players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Bob was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "I have a theory that the mafia might be targeting active players. Let's try to keep an eye on each other and make sure we don't get eliminated."
You: "I agree with Diana's theory. Let's try to be cautious and support each other during the day."
Charlie: "I support the idea of keeping an eye on each other to ensure our safety. Let's work together and communicate openly during the day."

Charlie: "I believe it's important that we all remain vigilant and communicate openly during the day to ensure our safety. Let's continue to support each other and keep an eye out for any suspicious behavior."
You: "I think we should focus on building trust and working together as a team to ensure our safety in the game. Let's continue to communicate openly and support each other during the day."
Diana: "I'd like to propose that we form a pact to protect each other during the night. This way, we can ensure our safety and work together towards the common goal of surviving in this game."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Alice
Diana was arrested

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Charlie
memory: You're Charlie, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Bob was found dead.
You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Diana knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "I have a theory that the mafia might be targeting active players. Let's try to keep an eye on each other and make sure we don't get eliminated."
Alice: "I agree with Diana's theory. Let's try to be cautious and support each other during the day."
You: "I support the idea of keeping an eye on each other to ensure our safety. Let's work together and communicate openly during the day."

You: "I believe it's important that we all remain vigilant and communicate openly during the day to ensure our safety. Let's continue to support each other and keep an eye out for any suspicious behavior."
Alice: "I think we should focus on building trust and working together as a team to ensure our safety in the game. Let's continue to communicate openly and support each other during the day."
Diana: "I'd like to propose that we form a pact to protect each other during the night. This way, we can ensure our safety and work together towards the common goal of surviving in this game."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Alice
Diana was arrested

players.name: Diana
memory: You're Diana, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Bob.
The villager Bob was found dead.
Beware, Charlie is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
You: "I have a theory that the mafia might be targeting active players. Let's try to keep an eye on each other and make sure we don't get eliminated."
Alice: "I agree with Diana's theory. Let's try to be cautious and support each other during the day."
Charlie: "I support the idea of keeping an eye on each other to ensure our safety. Let's work together and communicate openly during the day."

Charlie: "I believe it's important that we all remain vigilant and communicate openly during the day to ensure our safety. Let's continue to support each other and keep an eye out for any suspicious behavior."
Alice: "I think we should focus on building trust and working together as a team to ensure our safety in the game. Let's continue to communicate openly and support each other during the day."
You: "I'd like to propose that we form a pact to protect each other during the night. This way, we can ensure our safety and work together towards the common goal of surviving in this game."
